Forum Solutions is a application used for interaction between people who know each other to gain solution to there problems.It can used to ask or tell any kind of ideas,queries,etc.This application can maintain active participation among users or friend or known people for discussion purpose.It can be specially made to use for technical,logical or any kind of contents as per the institute or group of users.

 How to add Questions:-

 1.click on Question and answer button to to ask or view question-list.
2.Type the question in given Text area.
3.click on post to post the question , click on clear to clear the text field.
You can press the back button of the device and view your question.

How to answer:-

1.click on question and answer button.
2.click on the question which you want to answer from the list.
3.type the answer in the text area.
4.click on post to post the answer.

How to Comment:- 

1.click on the questions and answer button click on particular question to view its answer.
2.click on the answer to comment.
3.click on ok to comment.
4.type the comment for the answer and click on post to post it.

How to delete comment:-

slide the comment which you want to delete and click on delete logo.
